channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Kantar for Knack and Le Vif, 22 January–8 February 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams (EPP): 1–2 seats
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • Vlaams Belang (ID): 3–4 seats
  • Vooruit (S&D): 2 seats
  • Groen (Greens/EFA): 1 seats
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten (RE): 1 seats
  • Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie (ECR): 3 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Kantar for Knack and Le Vif, 22 January–8 February 2024 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by Kantar for Knack and Le Vif, 22 January–8 February 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams (EPP): 8.8–12.5%
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België (GUE/NGL): 9.1–12.9%
  • Vlaams Belang (ID): 23.0–28.2%
  • Vooruit (S&D): 12.7–16.9%
  • Groen (Greens/EFA): 7.2–10.6%
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten (RE): 6.5–9.8%
  • Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie (ECR): 18.3–23.1%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Kantar and Universiteit Antwerpen for De Standaard and VRT, 8–22 January 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties

item.title: Opinion Poll by Kantar and Universiteit Antwerpen for De Standaard and VRT, 8–22 January 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams (EPP): 9.9–12.8%
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België (GUE/NGL): 9.6–12.4%
  • Vlaams Belang (ID): 25.8–29.9%
  • Vooruit (S&D): 12.2–15.4%
  • Groen (Greens/EFA): 7.0–9.5%
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten (RE): 7.8–10.4%
  • Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie (ECR): 17.2–20.8%
